summary:
Using ApachiiSkyHair, High Quality Eyes by Xenius, and Extended Slider Colors v4.6

Created an Orc that was unique looking and bad-ass!
descriptionHtml:
Savegame starts directly after character creation where your about to be called to the chopping block, this gives you the option of choosing who you want to follow.

You can rename your Orc using the \"show racemenu\" console command.

Mods used:

ApachiiSkyHair
High Quality Eyes by Xenius
Extended Slider Bars v4.6
author: Zyphis
